nitf
Class StreamIOWriteHandler

java.lang.Object
  nitf.NITFObject
      nitf.DestructibleObject
          nitf.WriteHandler
              nitf.StreamIOWriteHandler

public class StreamIOWriteHandler
extends WriteHandler

A WriteHandler that just streams from an input IOInterface to an output one. Handy for bypassing segments when needing to round-trip.
